alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 7:57PM MST until July 30 at 11:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 757 PM MST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain early with elevated flow in Tiger Wash. Minor flooding is already occurring or about to begin along Eagle Eye Road. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain fell earlier. - Eagle Eye Road is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Floodwaters could also impact Salome Road. This includes the following streams and drainages... Browns Canyon Wash, Tiger Wash and Pump Mine Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Maricopa County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
